question:
You recently organised an all-day meeting for your company, which took place ina local hotel. In their feedback, participants at the meeting said that they liked the hotel,but they were unhappy about the food that was served for lunch. 
Write a letter to the manager of the hotel. In your letter
 • say what the participants liked about the hotel •explain why they were unhappy about the food • suggest what the managee should do to improve the food in the future.
text: I am formally writing this letter to inform you about our participants feedback regarding with the hotel facilities and food services. The hotel was perfectly fine. However, there are some complaints about the foods that has been served.

Let me explain in more details. Almost all of the participants were fascinated by the classical architecture of the hotel. In addition, the room that we occupied for the meeting was designed just like the way we wanted it. However, the food that has been served was quite disappointing especially the roast chicken. It was not roasted properly. Hence, the blood was still visible and resulted with foul smell.

I would highly suggest to the staffs, especially the kitchen staff,  should recheck the the food  before serving it to guest. They may request for a new roaster machine in which readly available in the markey, in order for them to roast the chicken properly and fast.
